thread.title: India’s Industrial Output Climbs to Three-Year High in August
thread.title_full: India’s Industrial Output Climbs to Three-Year High in August - WSJ

author: Anant Vijay Kala
title: India’s Industrial Output Climbs to Three-Year High in August
text:
NEW DELHI—India’s industrial output rose at its strongest pace in nearly three years in August and the country’s inflation rate rose in September, government data showed Monday.
Industrial production, a measure of output in the manufacturing, mining and utilities sectors, rose 6.4% from a year earlier in August, quicker than the 4.1% rise in July and significantly more than the 5.0% increase predicted by economists polled by The Wall...
